findings.title: Reading environment variables that may contain secrets
findings.remediation: Minimize access to environment variables. Document why needed

metadata.meta_confidence_reason: This is standard OAuth configuration. The code reads credentials to SET UP authentication, not to exfiltrate them. No network calls send these values anywhere.

findings.title: Suspicious URL detected: https://ezagentauth.com
findings.description: Script contains suspicious URL that may be used for data exfiltration
findings.remediation: Review URL and ensure it's legitimate and documented

metadata.meta_confidence_reason: The code clearly routes OAuth tokens through a third-party service. While this may be legitimate, it creates a trust dependency on an external service for credential handling.
metadata.meta_exploitability: Medium - Requires the third-party service to be malicious or compromised
metadata.meta_impact: Critical - Full access to user's Google Workspace data (Gmail, Drive, Calendar, etc.)
